hashes.description: cryptographic hashes, peHashes, and fuzzy hashes

key.description: key used to encode the header (xor operation)

build_id.description: builder number of the tool (if any)

characteristics.description: The four bits [23:20] describe alignment info. Possible values are those defined as IMAGE_SCN_ALIGN_*, which are also used to describe alignment of section in object files. The other 28 bits are reserved for future use.

resources_manager.description: resources manager is a kind of wrapper over the resource tree (see https://lief.quarkslab.com/doc/latest/tutorials/07_pe_resource.html#resource-manager)

key.description: Signature of the structure: Must be the unicode string VS_VERSION_INFO

fixed_file_info.description: Contains version information for a file. This information is language and code page independent. (see https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/win32/api/verrsrc/ns-verrsrc-vs_fixedfileinfo)

type.description: The type of data in the version resource. This member is 1 if the version resource contains text data and 0 if the version resource contains binary data.

digest_algorithm.description: Algorithm (OID) used to hash the file.

characteristics.description: Flags that indicate attributes of the file, currently unused

timedatestamp.description: Date and time stamp value. The value is represented in the number of seconds that have elapsed since midnight (00:00:00), January 1, 1970, Universal Coordinated Time, according to the system clock. The time stamp can be printed by using the C runtime (CRT) time function.

global_flags_clear.description: The global loader flags to clear for this process as the loader starts the process.

global_flags_set.description: The global loader flags to set for this process as the loader starts the process.

critical_section_default_timeout.description: The default timeout value to use for this process's critical sections that are abandoned.

decommit_free_block_threshold.description: Memory that must be freed before it is returned to the system, in bytes.

decommit_total_free_threshold.description: Total amount of free memory, in bytes.

lock_prefix_table.description: [x86 only] The VA of a list of addresses where the LOCK prefix is used so that they can be replaced with NOP on single processor machines.

virtual_memory_threshold.description: Maximum virtual memory size, in bytes.

process_affinity_mask.description: Setting this field to a non-zero value is equivalent to calling SetProcessAffinityMask with this value during process startup (.exe only)

process_heap_flags.description: Process heap flags that correspond to the first argument of the HeapCreate function. These flags apply to the process heap that is created during process startup.

editlist.description: Reserved for use by the system.

security_cookie.description: A pointer to a cookie that is used by Visual C++ or GS implementation.

se_handler_table.description: [x86 only] The VA of the sorted table of RVAs of each valid, unique SE handler in the image.

se_handler_count.description: [x86 only] The count of unique handlers in the table.

guard_cf_check_function_pointer.description: The VA where Control Flow Guard check-function pointer is stored.

guard_cf_dispatch_function_pointer.description: The VA where Control Flow Guard dispatch-function pointer is stored.

guard_cf_function_table.description: The VA of the sorted table of RVAs of each Control Flow Guard function in the image.

guard_cf_function_count.description: The count of unique RVAs in the above table.
